step.reason: \text{If two matrices are equal, they must be} \\ \text{identical. In other words, the same number} \\ \text{of rows and columns and corresponding} \\ \text{elements equal.}
\text{Comparing corresponding elements on both} \\ \text{sides we get, } a-b=-1 \text{ and } 2a-b=0. \\ \therefore a=1.
